markdownRemark.html:
When we have pushed ourselves to the brink of chaos and instability…

As intelligent as us humans had become, we are still limited to the planets resources - the natural world. We cannot disconnect ourselves easily from how we depend on the air we breath, the water we drink and the food we eat on day to day basis of which the average person fail to remember nowadays in my observation. I guess our ability to become masters of tranformations through ground breaking inventions in the past 20 years like the internet, social media platforms and smartphones enabled to widen the gap of disconnection
